# 部署秘钥：

### 1.查询部署秘钥列表

```
GET /api/v1/repos/:username/:reponame/keys
```

响应：

```
Status: 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json
```

```
[
    {
        "id": 1,
        "key": "ssh-rsa  comment with whitespace",
        "url": "http://localhost:3000/api/v1/repos/HIP/go-cas/keys/1",
        "title": "local",
        "created_at": "2017-02-17T14:44:34+08:00",
        "read_only": true
    }
]
```

### 2.查询某个部署秘钥

```
GET /api/v1/repos/:username/:reponame/keys/:id
```

响应：

```
Status: 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json
```

### 3.添加一个新的部署秘钥

```
POST /api/v1/repos/:username/:reponame/keys
```

参数：

| Name | Type | Desc |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| title | string | 秘钥的名字 |
| key | string | 秘钥的内容 |

例子：

```
{
    "title":"secret",
    "key":"ssh-rsa "
}
```

响应：

```
Status: 201 Created
Content-Type: application/json
```

```
{
  "id": 2,
  "key": "ssh-rsa ",
  "url": "http://localhost:3000/api/v1/repos/HIP/go-cas/keys/2",
  "title": "secret",
  "created_at": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z",
  "read_only": true
}
```
